Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Annie>
Entry.EnglishText: <Annie>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Hilda>
Entry.EnglishText: <Hilda>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>

Entry.JapaneseText: スカラベ
Entry.EnglishText: Scarabe

Entry.JapaneseText: ジャンニ
Entry.EnglishText: Gianni

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>

Entry.JapaneseText: 男の人
Entry.EnglishText: Man

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマの人々
Entry.EnglishText: Huma Crowd

Entry.JapaneseText: <Agarte>
Entry.EnglishText: <Agarte>

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: ベルサス
Entry.EnglishText: Belsas

Entry.JapaneseText: ベルサス
Entry.EnglishText: Belsas

Entry.JapaneseText: 人がいっぱいだね。
Entry.EnglishText: What a turn out!

Entry.JapaneseText: こんな大勢で、 交渉ができるのかしら……
Entry.EnglishText: How can they possibly hope to hold a discussion with such a large crowd...?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……まるで見世物でも 始まるような感じね。
Entry.EnglishText: ...It's as though a show is about to begin.

Entry.JapaneseText: なんとなく イヤな雰囲気だぜ……
Entry.EnglishText: I have a bad feeling about this...

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマの同志たちよ。 高潔で誇り高き同族の友よ。 立ち上がる時が来た。
Entry.EnglishText: Welcome, my fellow Huma. My noble brethren whom I hold in high esteem, it is time for us to rise up!

Entry.JapaneseText: 待て！ どういう事だ、スカラベ！
Entry.EnglishText: Wait a minute! What the hell do you mean, Scarabe?!

Entry.JapaneseText: 黙って聞け!!
Entry.EnglishText: Be silent and listen!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>、これは!?
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>, this is...?!

Entry.JapaneseText: うむ……
Entry.EnglishText: I know...

Entry.JapaneseText: ワシは以前から疑問に思っていた。 なぜ、知的に我々よりも劣る ガジュマが王位につき、 この国を支配しているのか？
Entry.EnglishText: I have been questioning this for quite some time... Why have Gajuma, our intellectual inferiors, been placed on the throne and allowed to govern The Kingdom?

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマこそ優れた種族であり、 ガジュマの上に立つべきでは ないのか、と。
Entry.EnglishText: If Huma are the superior race, should they not take their rightful place above Gajuma?

Entry.JapaneseText: しかし!! それを口にすれば冷たい視線を浴び、 種族主義者だと悪者扱いされる。 この国では絶対のタブーだった。
Entry.EnglishText: Alas! Anyone who says such a thing is met with cold stares and vilified as a racist. To say such a thing is the ultimate taboo in this Kingdom.

Entry.JapaneseText: だが今こそ、我らヒューマが この国の覇権を握る時だ！ いまわしきガジュマは 我々の前にひれ伏すがよい！
Entry.EnglishText: At long last, it is time for us Huma to gain supremacy over this nation! The inferior Gajuma shall grovel at our feet!

Entry.JapaneseText: こんな横暴許さんぞ！ 我々ガジュマはおまえらの不当な扱いに、 おとなしく甘んじ続けるつもりはない！
Entry.EnglishText: We won't let you get away with oppressing us any longer! We Gajuma are tired of obediently putting up with the injustice you subject us to!

Entry.JapaneseText: そうだ！ 女王様はどうした!? 女王様を出せ!!
Entry.EnglishText: She's right! Where is the Queen?! Bring her out here!

Entry.JapaneseText: おまえたちの女王様はヒューマの娘の 誘拐を企み、我が娘も被害者となった。 女王は自らがすべき政務を怠り、 国を混乱に陥れたのだ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Your Queen is the one who plotted the abduction of Huma girls, including my own daughter. In neglecting her duties as head of state, she has thrown the nation into chaos!

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマをさらい、女王は この国の取る共存の道を否定した。 となれば、我らヒューマがガジュマに 虐げられるであろう事は想像に難くない。
Entry.EnglishText: By kidnapping Huma, she has denied The Kingdom a chance at coexistence. With that in mind, it is not hard to imagine a future in which us Huma are oppressed by Gajuma.

Entry.JapaneseText: 我らは我らの手によって、 新たな道を切り開いて いかなければならんのだ！
Entry.EnglishText: The time has come for us to carve out a path with our own hands!

Entry.JapaneseText: ここにヒューマによるヒューマのための 新しい時代の幕開けを宣言しようぞ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Here and now, we declare the beginning of a new era, created by Huma for the sake of Huma!

Entry.JapaneseText: <scale:180>おおーッ!!
Entry.EnglishText: <scale:180>Yeah!

Entry.JapaneseText: ふざけるな！ 女王様を出せ!!
Entry.EnglishText: You're out of your mind! Release the Queen!!

Entry.JapaneseText: ふん……
Entry.EnglishText: Hmph...

Entry.JapaneseText: お願いです、話を…… 彼らと話をしてあげてください。
Entry.EnglishText: I beg of you, please talk things out with them!

Entry.JapaneseText: うるさい！ このガジュマめが…… 女王などと大嘘をつきおって。
Entry.EnglishText: Shut up, you damned Gajuma! If you're going to lie about being the Queen, then you need to take responsibility for it.

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマたちに 動揺を与えたおまえには、 人柱になってもらう。
Entry.EnglishText: Since your actions have riled up the other Gajuma, I'll have your death form the pillar upon which this new era will stand.

Entry.JapaneseText: だが、その前に少しだけ時間をやろう。 謝罪でも命乞いでもするがいい。 その方が盛り上がるしな…… ふふふふふふ……
Entry.EnglishText: I will grant you just a little time before that happens, though. Go ahead and apologize, or beg for your life. That should make things all the more exciting. Hehehehe...

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No
